desc: Hi,I have a fantastic product, that on so many levels is an attractive purchase for customers.I just need the platform to sell them on, I need the traffic.These are Special Limited Edition Hightops, the first design, from Ireland's First Sneaker Label.Only 300 pairs were ever made, and no more ever will be either, so it's the rarest shoe you could ever own.They are 100% Premium Leather Hightops.At Only 30 euro per pair.. the big brands would charge x5 / x6 times this price for similar quality, which was the whole point in me starting this label at all ! To offer people better value, better quality.The shoes are in a Warehouse Distribution Centre right now, similar to an Amazon Fulfilment Centre, they are ready to go, there is global shipping, with a tracking number and parcel insurance, and the prices are fantastic.Payment is by paypal, or bank or if someone wants to use some other method I'll try to accommodate that too.Only downside is that my website is not built yet, I am relying on the sales of these shoes to finish building the site, so it's a bit of a downward spiral in that regard!There's nowhere to send customers, except to my facebook page, or to the email of my company.Anyway, I am offering 20% from each sale in commission.6 euro from each sale.With up to 1,800 euro for you to make.300 sales is not that much, if you have a substantial enough audience at your fingertips.If you go for this, I can send you any amount of images, details on the shoes and a video of them too.Let's get selling, asap.Win win.Cheers,Glenn
title: Looking for Affiliates (20% Commission) / Sales / Marketing / E Commerce / Internet Advertising

desc: Seeking one person: Full time: Bilingual Customer Service/Sales/Warehousing$35,[url removed, login to view] expected to start$12/hr to start plus over time and annual Christmas bonus45 hour work week.  (40 regular+5hrs overtime)(Often extra additional overtime)Monday – Friday 8am-5pmNo “official” lunch break, eat lunch when free time or someone covers for youNo Medical/Dental InsuranceOne week paid vacation yearlyFour paid sick days yearlyChristmas Bonus•	Customer service oriented•	Good people and interpersonal skills•	Fluent in English and Spanish•	Speaks English clearly•	Some sales experience•	Building customer relationships sales mentality•	Must be able to lift 50 lbs.•	Will assist with receiving shipments in warehouse, preparing outgoing packages, etc in addition to showroom and office tasks•	Team oriented•	Email, faxing, phones, basic computer skillsPrimary Tasks:Training period:	Answering phones, stocking shelves in showroom, checking in inventory shipments to learn products, packing outgoing shipments, helping check in orders, talking to customers, keeping showroom organized, emailing and faxing.Post Training:	All above tasks, sales, customer service, invoicing orders and sales in computer system, open and close store when senior members cannot, attending classes on-site for advanced product knowledge training, making discount and customer credit decisions.We will train in all aspects of the job.Weekly paycheckNo vacation last week of DecemberOpen most holidays, closed most major holidays w/paySmall retailer of contractor supplies seeking person to hire full time for customer service, sales, and warehouseman position.  All of our customers are business to business and repeat business.  We build and maintain relationships with these client’s by providing excellent customer service, technical support, equipment, parts and repairs, rentals, training, and an excellent selection of products at a fair price.  We’ve been in business since 1973 and have dominant market share in south Florida.

desc: Hello, We are a team looking for someone to work as our Facebook Advertisements specialist. You must be able to handle ALL aspects of Facebook Advertising. Responsibilities will include:-Creating image advertisement-writing copy text for advertisement-access client accounts from our manager account-setup new clients ad accounts from start to finish-set up demographics and target interests-set and monitor budgets-set locations-optimize campaign for maximum results-Must be able to start working within a day of me assigning a task to you.We are deadline oriented and cannot wait days before you respond and submit work. Overall you must be able to handle an entire ads campaign from start to finish. If you do good work we will continually use your services.We will only hire people who present full case studies in their proposal, which include:-screenshots of the results in Ads Manager in a recent version of Facebook Business Manager-the story of the results of a client with before and after casesPeople who sell full funnels and can present this to us in a good fashion, which mean having created a landing page related to the campaign in the Business Manager will be interviewed for sure.Do not apply if you do not present good looking case studies.We want to hire people for long term, and you will get many projects if we choose you.If you have read the job offer, start your message with "green".
title: Looking for a Facebook Ads Expert
